Flint.Flint North: GM Powertrain Flint North (GMPT Flint North) was a General Motors automobile engine and components plant located at the Stewart Avenue exit of I-475 in Flint, Michigan . The plant consisted of several factories that combine to make the Flint North Powertrain plant. The 4,000,000-square-foot (370,000 m2) plant opened in 1905 as part of the Buick Motor Company, and was the last part of Buick City standing.
